dailyDharma.heading: Begin Your Journey to Inner Peace
dailyDharma.subHeading: Discover daily practices crafted to nurture your mind and spirit.
dailyDharma.findPeaceTitle: Find Peace and Clarity with Daily Practices
dailyDharma.findPeaceSubtitle1: Simple routines to support your well-being, tailored for you.
dailyDharma.findPeaceSubtitle2: Make dharma a part of your daily rhythm. This space offers bite-sized practices ‚Äî chants, affirmations, reflections, and mindful rituals ‚Äî designed to ground you in inner peace and purpose. Start your day with spiritual clarity and return whenever your soul needs a reset.

dailyDharma.quote: ‚ÄúWith a pure heart, every moment becomes a sacred practice.‚Äù

dailyDharma.familySubtitle1: Come together in devotion before meals, growing in spirit as a family.
dailyDharma.familySubtitle2: Strengthen family bonds through shared rituals that connect you to Sanatan Dharma, fostering love, gratitude, and cultural heritage in every meal.
dailyDharma.familyFooter: Create a shared journey for peace and connection!
dailyDharma.faq1Title: Why build a daily spiritual practice?
dailyDharma.faq1Desc:
In a world of constant noise, daily spiritual practice is a quiet anchor. It grounds your energy, purifies your intent, and gently brings you back to what matters. KalpX offers simple, accessible practices ‚Äî from morning chants and breathwork to evening reflection and gratitude ‚Äî so that spirituality becomes not a task, but a rhythm.

Whether you light a diya before work, repeat a mantra on your commute, or take 2 minutes to sit in silence before sleep ‚Äî these small rituals create big shifts over time. Consistency becomes connection. Repetition becomes realization.

Let KalpX help you infuse your everyday with purpose, presence, and peace.
dailyDharma.faq2Title: What you‚Äôll find in Daily Practice
dailyDharma.faq2Desc:
‚úî Morning invocations, chants, and affirmations to start the day
‚úî Guided meditations for clarity, energy, and calm
‚úî Breathwork and grounding techniques based in yogic science
‚úî Short reflections on dharma, gratitude, and intention-setting
‚úî Evening wind-down rituals and sacred closing prayers
‚úî Bite-sized stories and teachings for daily inspiration
‚úî Practices designed for all ages, including children and elders
dailyDharma.faq3Desc:
‚úî Anyone looking to cultivate inner calm and consistency
‚úî Beginners unsure where to start with spiritual habits
‚úî Parents wanting simple rituals to share with their kids
‚úî Professionals needing short, grounding pauses in their day
‚úî Seekers seeking structure without pressure
‚úî Elders returning to daily devotion
dailyDharma.faq4Desc:
ü™î Choose one simple practice to begin with ‚Äî and stay consistent
‚è∞ Set a regular time (sunrise, lunch break, before bed)
üìø Use malas, bells, or incense to engage the senses
üì± Bookmark your favorite KalpX routines for easy access
üë®‚Äçüë©‚Äçüëß Create a shared family ritual to build cultural memory
dailyDharma.faq5Title: What makes KalpX Daily Practice different?
dailyDharma.faq5Desc:
‚úî Spiritually potent, yet simple and practical
‚úî Crafted for modern life ‚Äî short formats, flexible timing
‚úî Deeply rooted in Sanatan Dharma‚Äôs daily rhythm
‚úî Accessible to all ‚Äî no prior knowledge required
‚úî A blend of devotion, discipline, and discovery

testimonials.author: Rahul Mehta
testimonials.text: I like how KalpX focuses on daily life, not just theory. The Sankalp helps me stay mindful throughout the day.

testimonials.author: Sandeep Patel
testimonials.text: The daily sankalp practices bring a gentle structure to my routine. It doesn't feel heavy, just gently guiding.

testimonials.author: Ananya Sharma
testimonials.text: Beautiful interface and even more beautiful content. The wisdom videos are a great way to start my morning.

testimonials.author: Vikram Singh
testimonials.text: I've tried many meditation apps, but KalpX's focus on Sanatan Dharma makes it unique and deeply meaningful.

testimonials.author: Priya Iyer
testimonials.text: The community features help me stay connected with like-minded people. It's a very supportive environment.

explore.title: Explore Videos
explore.subtitle: Reconnect with Your Roots ‚Äî Start Watching

faq.title: Why Explore Spiritual Videos?
faq.description: In a fast-moving world, we often forget to pause and reflect. KalpX Videos offer a moment to reconnect ‚Äî with timeless wisdom, inspiring stories, sacred movement, and devotional depth ‚Äî wherever you are. Whether you‚Äôre watching a classical Bharatanatyam performance, a sacred mantra chant, a ritual from a temple, or a short teaching on karma or consciousness, each video opens a window into Sanatan Dharma‚Äôs living heartbeat. You‚Äôll also find guided meditations, yoga practices, spiritual music, and cultural storytelling ‚Äî all curated to help you grow in awareness, devotion, and joy. Let these visuals transport you beyond the screen ‚Äî into a space of reverence, inquiry, and inner clarity. Watch alone, with family, or as part of your daily spiritual rhythm.

faq.title: What You‚Äôll Find in Explore Videos
faq.description:
‚Ä¢ ‚úî Teachings on dharma, consciousness, and inner peace
‚Ä¢ ‚úî Rituals and poojas from sacred temples across Bharat
‚Ä¢ ‚úî Classical Indian dance (Bharatanatyam, Odissi, Kathak & more)
‚Ä¢ ‚úî Guided yoga, meditation, and breathwork rooted in tradition
‚Ä¢ ‚úî Devotional music, bhajans, kirtans, and mantra chanting
‚Ä¢ ‚úî Stories from the Ramayana, Mahabharata, and Puranas
‚Ä¢ ‚úî Culturally rich videos for children and families
‚Ä¢ ‚úî Dialogues with gurus, yogis, artists, and wisdom keepers

faq.title: Who Are Curated KalpX Videos For?
faq.description:
‚Ä¢ ‚úî Spiritual seekers and lifelong learners
‚Ä¢ ‚úî Diaspora audiences reconnecting with their heritage
‚Ä¢ ‚úî Artists, dancers, yogis, and musicians honoring sacred traditions
‚Ä¢ ‚úî Parents introducing dharma to children in engaging ways
‚Ä¢ ‚úî Anyone looking for screen time that uplifts, educates, and transforms

faq.title: What Makes Curated KalpX Videos Different?
faq.description:
‚Ä¢ ‚úî Authentic, lineage-rooted content curated with care
‚Ä¢ ‚úî Visuals that inspire devotion, stillness, and self-inquiry
‚Ä¢ ‚úî Diverse voices, regional traditions, and cultural depth
‚Ä¢ ‚úî Made for transformation ‚Äî not just passive viewing

faq.title: How Can I Find Videos That Interest Me?
faq.description:
‚Ä¢ ‚úî Use the search bar to find specific topics.
‚Ä¢ ‚úî Filter by category, language, or tags to narrow down your selection.
‚Ä¢ ‚úî Toggle the Kids Hub for family-friendly content.

faq.title: Are the Videos Available in Multiple Languages?
faq.description:
‚Ä¢ ‚úî Yes, videos are available in languages like English, Hindi, Tamil, Telugu, and more.
‚Ä¢ ‚úî Select your preferred language from the filters to view relevant content.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: KalpX ("we", "our", or "us") values your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, store, and protect your information when you access or use the KalpX platform, including through our website or mobile applications.
privacy.section1Content:
Information You Provide: Name, email, optional profile info.
Automatically Collected: UUID, video events, IP, browser, etc.
privacy.section2Content: To authenticate users, personalize content, track engagement, improve KalpX, and comply with legal obligations.
privacy.section3Content: We do not sell your data. We may share it with hosting, analytics, or legal entities as needed.
privacy.section4Content: Used to remember your preferences, track engagement anonymously, and improve recommendations.
privacy.section5Content: SSL, authentication controls, and limited access are used to keep your data safe.
privacy.section6Content: You can access, update, or delete your data. Contact us any time.
privacy.section7Content: To delete your KalpX account and data, email us at support@kalpx.com with subject line: "Delete My KalpX Account".

section1.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
section1.text: By accessing and using KalpX, you agree to abide by our specific Terms of Service and Community Rules. Participation in this platform implies a commitment to the Dharmic values we uphold.

section2.title: 2. Content Ownership & License
section2.text: You retain ownership of the content you post on KalpX. However, by posting, you grant KalpX a non-exclusive, royalty-free license to display, distribute, and promote your content within the platform and its related services.

section3.title: 3. Moderation & Adharmic Content
section3.text: KalpX reserves the right to review and remove any content that violates our Community Rules or is deemed Adharmic (against the principles of righteousness and truth). We strive to maintain a pure and positive environment.

section4.title: 4. Termination
section4.text: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate accounts that repeatedly violate these agreements or engage in harmful behavior. This is to protect the sanctity of the community.

section5.title: 5. Changes to Agreements
section5.text: These agreements may be updated to reflect the evolving needs of our growing spiritual community. Continued use of the platform after changes implies acceptance of the new terms.

rules.title: KalpX Community Rules

rule1.title: 1. Respect for Dharma (Righteousness)
rule1.text: We uphold truth, compassion, and non-violence (Ahimsa) in all our interactions. Speak with kindness and integrity. Adhere to the principles of Dharma in your conduct within the community.

rule2.title: 2. Authenticity of Scripture
rule2.text: When discussing Shastras, Vedas, Puranas, or other sacred texts, please cite your sources respectfully and accurately. Misleading interpretations or fabricating information is discouraged.

rule3.title: 3. No Hate Speech or Adharmic Conduct
rule3.text: We have zero tolerance for malice, blasphemy, discrimination, or intent to harm others. Any speech that spreads hatred or division is considered Adharmic and will be removed.

rule4.title: 4. Constructive Debate (Shastrartha)
rule4.text: Debates should be grounded in the spirit of Jigyasa (seeking truth), not Ahankara (ego). Engage in discussions to learn and share knowledge, not to prove superiority.

rule5.title: 5. Respect for Deities and Gurus
rule5.text: Maintain reverence when speaking of Deities, Gurus, and spiritual teachers. Constructive discussion is welcome, but disrespect is not tolerated.

rules.quoteTranslation: Dharma protects those who protect it.

section1.title: 1. Sanctity of Your Data
section1.text: We consider your personal sadhana data, journal entries, and spiritual progress as sacred and private. We treat your information with the highest level of confidentiality and respect.

section2.title: 2. Data Collection
section2.text: We collect minimal data necessary to provide you with a personalized spiritual experience. This includes your username, email (for account recovery), and your interactions within the community to improve content recommendations.

section3.title: 3. Usage of Information
section3.text: Your data is used solely to enhance your journey on KalpX. We do not sell your personal information to third-party advertisers. We believe your spiritual growth is not a product.

section4.title: 4. Third-Party Services
section4.text: We may use trusted third-party services for hosting, analytics, and communication. These partners are bound by strict confidentiality agreements and are only provided with data necessary to perform their functions.

section5.title: 5. Security
section5.text: We employ industry-standard security measures to protect your data from unauthorized access, alteration, or disclosure. However, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure.

about.heroHeading: The heart of your inner journey
about.heroText: KalpX is home to countless paths for personal growth, mindful practices, and genuine self-discovery. Whether you‚Äôre exploring meditation, building inner resilience, seeking clarity in your career, or simply nurturing calm in daily life, there‚Äôs a guided journey on KalpX for you.
